projectInfo: A simple MERN CRUD app to track and manage plant care routines. Users can add, edit, delete, and view plant details with theme support and responsive design.

An e-learning platform where users can browse courses, enroll, and view details. Admins can manage course listings and students. Implements seat limit, dynamic dashboards, and Firebase-based secure login.

A Reddit/Dev.to inspired MERN forum for developers to share ideas, ask questions, and collaborate. Features include posts, comments, voting, reports, membership, admin dashboard, and JWT-secured authentication.
